ygData.msgSnippet: ... She watched him tumble down the hill. She saw him stop at the bottom and now was her chance.  She flew down and perched on a log next to him.  Please, now

::GoldenEye::

She watched him tumble down the hill. She saw him stop at the bottom 
and now was her chance.  She flew down and perched on a log next to 
him.  "Please, now will you talk to me? I said I won't hurt you and I 
meant it.  My name is GoldenEye.  Please tell me your name?  I....I 
just want to ask you a question and then I'll fly away and not bother 
you again."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Rattrap:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Rattrap kept running. For many reasons, he didn't believe her. He 
> wasn't going to stop for no one, in fear that she was from either 
> Megatron's or Hell Beast's sides. He dodged trees and jumped over 
> downed trees, snapped in half and uprooted. 
> 
> He charged through the forest, with the dry leaves brushing against 
> his furless feet. Approaching a slide, his back foot crashed 
against 
> a dead log, which made him loose his balance and slip. His body 
went 
> tumbling down, first on his side. He soon tucked his body in until 
he 
> looked like a ball, and rolled down the slide. At the foot of it, 
his 
> body rolled off the eroded base, and fell into the ground with a 
> grunt.
